resources.string:
SWIFT payments are currently unavailable.

Service operating hours (Central Africa Time) are:
Monday to Friday
08:00 - 17:00
Unavailable on weekends and public holidays.
Share your banking details with a contact so that you can receive international SWIFT payments.

Hello. Please find my Absa Swift account details below:
Account name: %s
Account type: %s
%sAccount number: %s
Branch code: 632005
SWIFT code: ABSAZAJJ
You will only be able to recieve funds in the same currency as the account you have chosen.
If the purpose of payment is not listed here, please proceed to Absa On-line Banking to process, or call +2711 3354020 for assistance to process payments related to third parties.

On %s at %s

Your transaction has been successfully submitted under payment reference
%s.

You will receive the SWIFT payment details via SMS/email within the hour.

On %s at %s

This SWIFT incoming payment has already been processed under payment reference %s. The proof of payment can be viewed on Absa Online Banking website.

If you did not redeem this payment, please contact the fraud hotline below.

On %s at %s

This SWIFT incoming payment is being processed under payment reference %s.

If you are not currently redeeming this payment, please contact the fraud hotline below.
I have read and accept the\nReserve Bank Declaration
You have been sent international funds. Please review and complete the details below to receive your funds.
Is an individual or a company sending you money?
No charges - Costs were paid by the sender

By accepting I declare that:
 
• I have read, understood and accept the Regulatory and Compliance legal terms. 
• I have read the Terms of use and understand the content thereof. 
• The information furnished above is in all respect both true and correct. 
• The currency applied for will only be used for the specific purpose stated herein. 
• The documentation presented in support of this transaction is in all respect authentic. 
• I have been informed of the limit applicable to this transaction and confirm that this limit has not been exceeded as a result of the conclusion of this transaction. 
• I fully understand that the bank is required by law to report on funds that are being transferred or received. You agree that your information may be provided to certain Regulatory authorities like South African Revenue Service and / or the Financial Intelligence Centre, however reporting is not limited to these Regulators. 
• I confirm that none of the counter party/ parties involved in this transaction(s) can be linked to any of the sanctioned countries including but not limited to the following countries: Iran, North Korea, Syria, *Crimea Region, *Sudan (North) and *Cuba. 

*Certain transactions are permissible. You may be required to provide additional details. 
• I will comply with any law or exchange control regulation prescribed by the South African Reserve Bank and other relevant Legislative bodies which sets out how much and under what circumstances you may send money out of South Africa. Transactions can be blocked or delayed if you as the recipient do not obey the Laws. 
• I hereby confirm that the bank will prohibit the transaction, instruction or accounts I may be applying for, I further confirm that the bank may also have to end its relationship with me without warning. I confirm that the bank is not responsible for any losses or damages that I may suffer because of my action in this regard. 
• The Bank will not be liable for any losses caused by delays to the settlement of the transaction, such as system downtime or other failures of the site/online services. This includes any loss of profits or savings that you would otherwise have expected to make. 
• I will retain the supporting documentation related to this transaction for a period of 5(five) years, for inspection purposes by the Financial Surveillance Department of the South African Reserve Bank. 
• I fully understand that should I be required to and not submit supporting documents related to the transaction, to the bank within given time frames, the transaction will be cancelled. 
• I fully understand that the above provision constitutes an acknowledgement of facts and its effect will limit my right to claim that such fact is not accurate.
